{{Wired embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFVP41 |revision=v2 |asin=B00005Y7DQ |est_release_date=12/2004 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C2510;ARM 0506, SAMSUNG, S3C2510A01, K9C09; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800B-T |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638325TS-6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, CN4 |serial=yes,, 5-pin header,, CN5 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996L |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:14:BF }} {{TagLine|EtherFast Cable/DSL VPN Router with 4-port Switch}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=BEFVP41}}
The [https://homesupport.cisco.com/en-eu/support/routers/BEFVP41/ Linksys BEFVP41] (hardware version 2 in case) is an :"EtherFast Cable/DSL VPN Router with 4-port switch".
*[https://www.randomprojects.org/wiki/Linksys_BEFVP41 ''Linksys BEFVP41'' on '''RandomProjects''' wiki] (PCB images)
===Hardware=== *CPU: [http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheet2/5/0wfxot81suhqc9wzx5e6qy3kh07y.pdf Samsung S3C2510A01] (0506 K9C09) ARM940T *Flash: 8M-bit [1M x8/512K x16] CMOS Single Voltage 3V only (NOR) : :[http://www.dataman.com/media/datasheet/Macronix/MX29LV800B-T.pdf Macronix MX29LV800BBTC-90] (S04431 2K571900) *RAM: 2M x 32 Synchronous DRAM (SDRAM), 166MHz: :[http://doc.chipfind.ru/pdf/etron/em638325ts6.pdf EtronTech EM638325TS-6] (I470803RJJ870.1) *Switch: 6x port 10/100 Mbps Single Chip Ethernet Switch Controller: :[http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheets2/17/1785381_1.pdf Infineon ADM6996L] (AA0451 HSS430007.1SL) *Trans: 10/100 Base-T Ethernet Isolation Transformer: :[http://www.bothhandusa.com/products/100BaseT/TS6121CX-RevA5-020903.pdf BothHand-USA TS6121CX] (0510S) *Quad 2-input AND gate: [http://doc.chipfind.ru/pdf/philips/74lvc08ad.pdf Philips 74LVC08AD] (AP844 06 UnG04496) *PMU: 150KHz, 3A PWM Buck DC/DC Converter: [http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheets2/18/187340_1.pdf AnaChip AP1501-33] *PMU: 1A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable or Fixed-Mode Regulator: :[http://www.shsiyue.com/chips/data/ap1117.pdf AnaChip AP1117] (4LA) *10MHz crystal (for S3C2510A01): TXC BAy27 10.000 MHz *25MHz crystal (for ADM6996L): 25.0 MHz F4M *2x YCL PH202484 (0409)
